name: ZenSonic Pro Headphones
description: Studio-grade wireless headphones with ultra-low latency and adaptive noise cancellation. Experience audio purity like never before with ZenSonic Pro.

name: SkyGuard X-9 Drone
description: Professional-grade cinematic drone with 4K HDR camera and 45-minute flight time. Equipped with AI obstacle avoidance and GPS tracking.

name: Orbit Watch Series 5
description: The ultimate health and productivity companion. Features 24/7 heart rate monitoring, blood oxygen sensing, and seamless smartphone integration.

name: Lumina Smart Hub
description: Centralize your home automation with Lumina. Connect and control lights, thermostats, and security systems with intuitive touch or voice commands.

name: CyberPad Pro Tablet
description: Ultra-thin powerful tablet designed for creators. features a 120Hz Liquid Retina display and the latest neural engine for peak performance.

name: PulseFit Smart Scale
description: Track more than just weight. Get full body composition analysis including BMI, body fat percentage, and muscle mass directly to your app.

name: Aura Smart Mirror
description: Transform your morning routine with Aura. An intelligent mirror that displays news, weather, and your fitness stats while you get ready.

name: Vortex VR Headset
description: Step into the metaverse with Vortex. High-resolution optics and spatial audio deliver an unparalleled immersive virtual reality experience.
